
{{alias}}( str, idx )
    Returns the next extended grapheme cluster break in a string after a
    specified position.

    Parameters
    ----------
    str: string
        Input string.

    idx: integer
        Position.

    Returns
    -------
    out: integer
        Next extended grapheme cluster break position.
